title: Sorbo Quick and Easy Round Dispensing Dish Brush, Pot Brush, Comfort Grip, Strong and Durable, Everyday Essential Item, Assorted Colours
features: BUILT-IN SOAP DISPENSER: Features an easy-to-fill soap reservoir that releases detergent as you scrub, making dishwashing faster and more efficient
STRONG & DURABLE BRISTLES: Tough on grease and grime, the round bristle head delivers powerful cleaning for pots, pans, plates, and more
COMFORT GRIP HANDLE: Ergonomically designed for a secure, comfortable hold, perfect for everyday use without slipping, even when wet
EVERYDAY CLEANING ESSENTIAL: Ideal for quick clean-ups or full kitchen resets; this brush is a must-have tool in any household sink setup
ASSORTED COLOURS: Comes in a variety of colours to add a pop of fun to your cleaning routine (colour may vary between green, blue and grey)
